item.title: Generals.io game bot
item.description: Credit: dev.generals.io What is Generals.io? Generals.io is a turn-based strategy game that can be played in the browser. Each player starts out with one grid on a large map that is called the general. The goal of the game is to expand and eliminate other players’ generals. Once a player’s general gets taken, the player loses the game, and in the end, the last player standing wins the game.
